property.name: Rules
property.value: A: Shuffle cards stored in HQ and the Archives into R&D then draw five cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Difficulty of Black Ops agendas is reduced by 1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each source of meat damage inflicts +1 meat damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put four Boon counters on Corporate Boon when you score it. Boon Counter: Gain an action. Use this ability only once per turn and only during your turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put [15] from the bank on Corporate Coup when you score it.A: Take [3] from Corporate Coup, if it has any bits.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you score Corporate Downsizing, show to Runner any number of agenda cards stored in HQ. Gain bits equal to twice the combined agenda points of these cards then shuffle them into R&D.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You lose the following ability as soon as you rez or install any card. A: Gain [2].

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you have [12] or more bits in your pool when you score Corporate War, gain [12] otherwise, lose all bits.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain [10] and choose up to four cards stored in HQ when you score Data Fort Reclamation. Create a new data fort using the cards chosen. Install the cards one at a time you may rez them when you install them. Then, return to the bank any of the [10] not spent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put [12] from the bank on Detroit Police Contract when you score it. Take [2] from Detroit Police Contract, if it has any bits, at the start of each of your turns.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may choose to draw an additional card at the start of each of your turns. A: Draw two cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All code gates have +1 strength. When you score Encryption Breakthrough, reveal as many code gates as you wish. Then, gain [1] for each revealed or rezzed code gate.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Difficulty of Gray Ops agendas is reduced by 1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Difficulty of Research agendas is reduced by 1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain [5] when you score Hostile Takeover.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a piece of rezzed ice when you score Ice Transmutation. That ice now has +1 strength, and each subroutine on it is repeated once. Treat this as if each repeated subroutine appeared immediately after the original subroutine.

property.name: Rules
property.value: A:Trace 2 -If trace is successful, give Runner a tag.

property.name: Rules
property.value: A: Do 1 meat damage. Use this ability only if Runner is tagged.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put [12] from the bank on Political Coup when you score it. A: Take [3] from Political Coup, if it has any bits.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain [1] at the start of each of your turns.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may rez a piece of ice, at no cost, when you score Priority Requisition.

property.name: Rules
property.value: A:Trace 5 -If trace is successful, give Runner a tag.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Score 1 additional agenda point for every two advancement counters over Project Babylon's difficulty that are on Project Babylon when you score it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a fort when you score Security Net Optimization. That fort gives all ice installed on it +1 strength.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Show the top three cards of R&D to Runner when you score Security Purge. If any of those cards are ice, install and rez them, at no cost. Trash the rest of those cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: A: Do 2 meat damage. Use this ability only if Runner is tagged.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain an action during each of your turns.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All walls have +1 strength. When you score Superior Net Barriers, reveal as many walls as you wish. Then, gain [1] for each revealed or rezzed wall.

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Trace 5-If trace is successful, end the run, and Runner cannot run again until Runner takes an action to pay [1].

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ For the remainder of the run, Runner must pay [2] when encountering a piece of ice, in addition to any other costs, or end the run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Trash a program.@ End the run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Do 4 Net damage.@ Runner cannot break any subroutines of the next piece of ice encountered during the run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ For the remainder of the run, all further ice is encountered at +2 strength.

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ For the remainder of the run, all further ice is encountered at +1 strength.

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Do 3 Net damage.@ Trace 5-If trace is successful, give Runner a Cerberus counter. Each Cerberus counter does 2 Net damage at the start of each run. Runner may remove a Cerberus counter by taking an action to spend [4].@ End the run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Trace 6-If trace is successful, end the run, trash a piece of hardware, and do 2 meat damage. This damage cannot be prevented.

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Do 1 brain damage.@ Do 1 brain damage.@ End the run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ End the run.@ End the run.@ End the run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Do 1 brain damage.@ End the run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Trash a program.@ End the run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Do 3 Net damage.@ Runner cannot break any subroutines of the next piece of ice encountered during the run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Trash a program.@ End the run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Trace 5 -If trace is successful, give Runner a tag and a Data Raven counter. Each Data Raven counter gives Runner a tag at the start of each of his or her turns. Runner may remove a Data Raven counter by taking an action to pay [1].

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ End the run.@ End the run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Trace 4-If trace is successful, end the run, and Runner cannot run again until Runner takes an action to pay [2].

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Trace 5-If trace is successful, end the run, and Runner cannot run again until Runner takes an action to pay [2].

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ The next time Runner encounters a piece of ice during the run, do 3 Net damage unless Runner breaks all subroutines of that piece of ice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Trace 3-If trace is successful, give Runner a tag.

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Trace 4-If trace is successful, end the run and trash a program, and Runner cannot run again until Runner takes an action to pay [1].

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Runner cannot make another run during his or her next six actions.@ End the run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Trace 5-If trace is successful, end the run, trash a piece of hardware, and do 2 meat damage. This damage cannot be prevented.

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Trace 5-If trace is succesful, give Runner a tag.

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Trash a program.@ End the run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ For the remainder of the run, Runner cannot jack out.@ Trace 5-If trace is successful, give Runner a tag.

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B0G0T0:Trace5||A0B0G0T0:SimplyAnnounce{prevent the the runner from jacking out until the rest of the run}

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Do 1 Net damage.@ End the run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Do 1 brain damage.@ Do 1 brain damage.@ Do 1 brain damage.@ End the run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Do 1 brain damage.@ Do 1 Net damage.@ For the remainder of the run, all ice is encountered at +1 strength.@ Trace 5-If trace is successful, give Runner a Mastiff counter. Each Mastiff counter does 1 brain damage at the start of each run. Runner may removove a Mastiff counter by taking an action to spend[4]. @ End the run

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Do 2 Net damage.@ End the run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Do 1 Net damage.@ Runner cannot break any subroutines of the next piece of ice encountered during the run.

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B0G0T0:Inflict1NetDamage-onOpponent||A0B0G0T0:SimplyAnnounce{prevent the runner form breaking any subroutines on the next piece of ice}

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Trace 6-If trace is successful, give Runner a tag.@ Trace 6 - If trace is successful, give Runner a tag. Whenever Pocket Virtual Reality is encountered, gain [4]. Use these bits only to pay for the above traces. When the encounter ends, return to the bank any of the [4] you did not spend.

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Do 2 Net damage.@ End the run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ End the run.@ End the run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Trace 3-If trace is successful, end the run, and Runner cannot run again until Runner takes an action to pay [2].

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Trash a program.@ End the run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Runner cannot break any subroutines of the next piece of ice encountered during the run, and cannot jack out until after that encounter.

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B0G0T0:SimplyAnnounce{prevent the runner from jacking out or breaking any subroutines on the next ice}

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Do 2 Net damage.@ End the run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ End the run, and Runner forgoes his or her next action.

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Secretly spend [0], [1], or [2] Runner does the same. Then you and Runner reveal how much each of you spent. End the run unless you spent as many bits as Runner spent.

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B0G0T0:Trace2$$SimplyAnnounce{hide an amount of bits. Runner must use their trace card to hide their own amount as well.}

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Trash a program.@ End the run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ For the remainder of the run, all ice encountered has an additional subroutine, @ End the run, after all other subroutines.

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Roll a die. If you roll a 1, 2, or 3, Runner resumes the run from that many pieces of rezzed ice back, or jacks out. If there are not that many pieces of ice, Runner returns to the first piece of ice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ For the remainder of the run, Runner must pay [1] to jack out, in addition to any other costs.@ For the remainder of the run, Runner trashes an installed program after passing each piece of rezzed, including Viral 15, unless Runner jacks out.

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ For the remainder of the run, Runner must pay an additional [1] to break each subroutine.

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Do 2 Net damage.@ Do 2 Net damage.@ End the run.@ End the run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Do 1 brain damage.@ Do 1 brain damage.@ End the run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if Runner attempted two or more runs during his or her last turn. Trace 5-If trace is successful, give Runner a tag.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if Runner attempted a run during his or her last turn. Trace 5-If trace is successful, give Runner a tag.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if Runner is tagged. Runner loses all bits.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if Runner is tagged. Trash up to two resources, at no cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if Runner is tagged. Give Runner two tags.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain three consecutive actions, which you may use only to install cards. You are not required to take all three of these actions.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Move up to three advancement counters from one card to another installed card that can be advanced.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Add three advancement counters to any combination of installed cards that can be advanced.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if Runner is tagged. Give Runner a tag, and gain [1].

property.name: Rules
property.value: Conceal all revealed but unrezzed ice then rearrange your installed ice by swapping pairs of ice while Runner looks away.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bring any card from the Archives into HQ.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top five cards of R&D and arrange them in any order you choose.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if Runner is tagged. Trash X pieces of hardware, other than cybernetics.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Add four advancement counters to any combination of installed cards that can be advanced.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if Runner is tagged. Do 2 meat damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if Runner is tagged. Do 4 meat damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If any agendas were stolen during Runner's last turn, gain bits equal to three times the number of advancement counters those agendas had.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Add two advancement counters to any combination of installed cards that can be advanced.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Add one advancement counter to each of up to two installed cards that can be advanced.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if Runner stole any agendas during his or her last turn. Give Runner a tag.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if Runner is tagged. Do 5 meat damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Runner cannot use worms during runs on this fort. If Runner uses a worm during a run on this fort before Aardvark is rezzed, you may rez Aardvark to trash that worm, and any bits spent using that worm on the current piece of ice are lost to no effect. Runney may then use further Icebreakers to break the Ice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rezzing ACME S&L costs 1 agenda point, in addition to the normal cost. When you rez ACME S&L, gain [12] and trash ACME S&L. For the remainder of the game, pay [1] at the end of each of your turns, or lose the game. You can remove this effect, and score 1 agenda point by taking an action to pay [12].

property.name: Rules
property.value: All ice on this fort has +1 strength.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put [16] from the bank on BBS Whispering Campaign when you rez it. When all the bits have been removed, trash BBS Whispering Campaign. A: Take [2] from BBS Whispering Campaign.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Runner does not score any agenda (or agendas) during a run in which Bizarre Encryption Scheme is accessed return that agenda to the fort instead. Runner scores the agenda at the start of his or her next turn if neither you nor Runner has scored it by then. This does not affect any further runs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: A:Trace 5 -If trace is successful, give Runner a tag.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put [12] from the bank on Braindance Campaign when you rez it. Take [2] from Braindance Campaign at the start of each of your turns. When all the bits have been removed, trash Braindance Campaign.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cost to install ice on this fort is reduced by [2].

property.name: Rules
property.value: A, [3]: Add two advancement counters to an installed card that can be advanced.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Runner accesses Chimera, trash a daemon.

property.name: Rules
property.value: For each card Runner draws, give Runner a tag unless Runner pays [1], in addition to any other costs, to avoid receiving that tag. You may rez City Surveillance just before the card is drawn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the start of each of your turns, gain [1] for each agenda card stored in HQ that you show to Runner.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may advance Shattered Remains before and after you rez it. When Runner accesses Shattered Remains, it destroys one piece of hardware for each advancement counter on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: A: Choose one of your installed cards to be uninstalled. Store it in HQ.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Runner accesses Crybaby, give Runner a Crying counter. Each Crying counter reduces Runner's link by 2 during each trace attempt. Runner can remove a Crying counter by taking an action to pay [2].

property.name: Rules
property.value: Runner must pay [1], in addition to the normal cost, to break each subroutine of each piece of ice encountered during runs on this fort. Rez a region when you install it. Install a region only if you can pay to rez it. Only one region may be installed in each fort. Trash older ones.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cost to rez walls is reduced by [2]. All walls have +1 strength.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Runner accesses Dedicated Response Team, it does 3 meat damage. Ignore this effect unless Runner is tagged.

property.name: Rules
property.value: A: Put [3] from the bank on Department of Truth Enhancement. A: Take all the bits from Department of Truth Enhancement.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Runner accesses Dieter Esslin, Dieter does 1 Net damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may pay [1] to avoid receiving a Virus counter. Use this ability only once each turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Runner makes a successful run on this fort, you may choose an ice card stored in HQ. Pay half of that card's rez cost, rounded down, to force Runner to encounter it the run is not considered successful unless Runner passes that piece of ice. Trash that Ice after the encounter end. Use this ability only once during each run on this fort.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cost to rez code gates is reduced by [1]. All code gates have an additional subroutine, @ End the run, after all other subroutines.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hand size +2. A, [1]: Draw two cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may advance Experimental AI before and after you rez it. When Runner accesses Experimental AI, it destroys one program for each advancement counter on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cost to install ice is reduced by [1].

property.name: Rules
property.value: After each trace attempt, whether successful or not, put [1] from the bank on Hacker Tracker Central. During a trace attempt, each bit you spend from Hacker Tracker Central increases by 1 both your trace strength and your trace limit.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put [12] from the bank on Holovid Campaign when you rez it. Take [1] from Holovid Campaign at the start of each of your turns. When all the bits have been removed, trash Holovid Campaign.

property.name: Rules
property.value: A, 3 Agenda Points: Do 15 meat damage to Runner. Use this ability only if Runner has two or more tags.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may advance Information Laundering before and after you rez it. A, T: Gain [4] for each advancement counter on Information Laundering.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Take [1] from Investment Firm, if it has any bits, at the start of each of your turns. Whenever [1] or more bits are added to your pool, you may put [2] from the bank on Investment Firm for each [1] you choose not to add to your pool. Effects that give you bits at the start of yourn turn cannot be used this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Runner makes a successful run on this fort, you may choose an ice card stored in HQ. Install that piece of ice on this fort in the innermost position, paying an installation cost of [1] for each piece of ice already on the fort. Runner is now considered to be approaching that piece of ice. Use this ability only once during each run on this fort.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cost to rez walls on this fort is reduced by [2]. All walls on this fort have +1 strength. Rez a region when you install it. Install a region only if you can pay to rez it. Only one region may be installed in each fort. Trash older ones.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put [1] from the bank on Krumz when you rez it. Use this bit only to pay for traces. If you use this bit, replace it at the start of your next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rez Namatoki Plaza when you install it. Install Namatoki Plaza only if you can pay to rez it. Install only inside a subsidiary data fort. That fort may have an additional agenda or node installed inside it. If Namatoki Plaza leaves play while installed, and this results in the fort having too many agendas and nodes installed inside it, trash one of these agendas or nodes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain an action during each of your turns. If Nevinyrral leaves play while rezzed, you lose the game. Only one unique card of a particular name can be in play at a time. If for some reason more than one is in play, trash all but one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All nodes and other upgrades installed inside this fort cost [2], in addition to the normal cost, to trash. Rez a region when you install it. Install a region only if you can pay to rez it. Only one region may be installed in each fort. Trash older ones.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the start of each run, Runner must pay [1], in addition to any other costs, or end the run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: For half cost, rounded down, rez a piece of ice installed on this fort. Derez that ice at the end of the run. Use this ability only once during each run on this fort.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Swap a piece of unrezzed ice on this fort with an ice card stored in HQ. The new ice card comes into play concealed. Use this ability only once during each run on this fort.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Give Runner a tag at the end of each turn during which Runner received a tag.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may advance Pacifica Regional AI before and after you rez it. Regional AI advancement counter: Gain an action.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put [3] from the bank on Paris City Grid when you rez it. Use these bits only to pay for traces made during runs on this fort. If you use any of these bits, replace them at the start of your next turn. Rez a region when you install it. Install a region only if you can pay to rez it. Only one region may be installed in each fort. Trash older ones.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Runner must pay [5], in addition to any other costs, to steal agendas accessed from this fort, even on the run during which Runner trashes Red Herrings.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain an action during each of your turns.

property.name: Rules
property.value: A: Note the number of cards stored in HQ. Shuffle those cards into R&D, and then draw that many cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Roll a die whenever Runner passes a piece of rezzed ice during a run on this fort. On a 1, end the run. Rez a region when you install it. Install a region only if you can pay to rez it. Only one region may be installed in each fort. Trash older ones.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put [15] from the bank on Rockerboy Promotion when you rez it. When all the bits have been removed, trash Rockerboy Promotion. A: Take [3] from Rockerboy Promotion.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Install only inside a subsidiary data fort. This fort may be run only if you installed or advanced a card inside or on this fort during your last turn. Rez a region when you install it. Install a region only if you can pay to rez it. Only one region may be installed in each fort. Trash older ones.

property.name: Rules
property.value: A: Roll a die. If you roll less than or equal to the number of tags Runner has, Schlaghund does 10 meat damage and you trash Schlaghund.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Runner accesses Setup!, it does 2 Net damage, even if it is not installed. Ignore this effect if Runner accesses it from the Archives. If Setup! is accessed from R&D, Runner must show it to you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Swap a piece of unrezzed ice on this fort with an ice card stored in HQ. The new ice card comes into play concealed. Use this ability only once during each run on this fort. Rez a region when you install it. Install a region only if you can pay to rez it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cost to rez black ice is reduced by [2].

property.name: Rules
property.value: A: Do 1 meat damage. Use this ability only if Runner is tagged.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Take [1] from Spinn(R) Public Relations, if it has any bits, at the start of each of your turns. A: Put [3] from the bank on Spinn(R) Public Relations.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All ice on this fort has an additional subroutine, @ End the run unless Runner pays [1], after all other subroutines.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain [2] after each unsuccessful run on this fort. Rez a region when you install it. Install a region only if you can pay to rez it. Only one region may be installed in each fort. Trash older ones.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you pay [4] when Runner accesses TRAP!, it does 3 Net damage and gives Runner a tag, even if TRAP! is not installed. Ignore this effect if Runner accesses it from the Archives. If TRAP! is accessed from R&D, Runner must show it to you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trace 10-If trace is successful, give Runner a tag. Use this ability only when Runner accesses Turbeau Delacroix, and only once during each run on this fort.

property.name: Rules
property.value: During runs on this fort, Runner cannot use bits from stealth sources.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may advance Vacant Soulkiller before and after you rez it.When Runner accesses Vacant Soulkiller, it does 1 brain damage for each advancement counter on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may advance Vapor Ops before and after you rez it. Vapor Ops advancement counter: Gain [1]. A: Move any number of advancement counters from Vapor Ops to another installed card that can be advanced.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may advance Virus Test Site before and after you rez it. When Runner accesses Test Site, it does 2 Net damage per advancement counter on it, or 1 Net damage if it has no counters, even if it is not installed or rezzed. Ignore this effect if Runner accesses it from the Archives.If Test Site is accessed from R&D, Runner must show it to you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The difficulty of agendas installed inside this fort is reduced by 1. Rez a region when you install it. Install a region only if you can pay to rez it. Only one region may be installed in each fort. Trash older ones.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Afreet can have up to 3 MU of programs installed in it. All icebreakers installed in Afreet have their strength reduced by 1. If Afreet leaves play, trash all programs installed in it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [1]: Break sentry subroutine.[1]: +1 strength.At the start of each run, roll a die to determine AI Boon's strength @ for that run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [0]: Base link 1.[1]: +1 link.Use only one base link card for each trace attempt made against you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [0]: Base link 3.[2]: +1 link.Use only one base link card for each trace attempt made against you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [1]: Break ice subroutine.[1]: +1 strength. After passing each piece of ice, roll a die if you used Bartmoss Memorial Icebreaker to break any subroutines of that ice. On a 1, trash Memorial Icebreaker.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [0]: Roll a die. On a 4, 5, or 6, break ice subroutine otherwise, suffer that much Net damage. Use this ability only once on each subroutine during each encounter with a piece of ice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, give the Corp a Boardwalk counter. At the start of each of your turns, every two Boardwalk counters require the Corp to show you, at random, a card stored in HQ. If the Corp does not have enough cards stored in HQ, the Corp shows you as many cards as it has.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, give the Corp a Butcher Boy counter. Every two Butcher Boy counters gain you [1] at the start of each of your turns.The Corp may remove all Virus counters by forgoing its next three actions.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, give the Corp a Cascade counter. Every two Cascade counters require the Corp to trash faceup one card stored in R&D, at the start of each of its turns.The Corp may remove all Virus counters by forgoing its next three actions.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put [3] from the bank on Cloak when it is installed. Use these bits only to pay for using icebreakers during runs, but not for using noisy icebreakers. If you use any of these bits, replace them at the start of your next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All ice is encountered with its strength reduced by 1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, give the Corp a Cockroach counter. Two or more Cockroach counters cause all discards from HQ to become random.The Corp may remove all Virus counters by forgoing its next three actions.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, give the Corp a Thought counter. Three or more Thought counters allow you to look at the top card of R&D at the start of each of your turns.The Corp may remove all Virus counters by forgoing its next three actions.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [1]: Break pit bull, hellhound, bloodhound, or watchdog subroutine.[1]: +1 strength

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B1G0T0:SimplyAnnounce{break pit bull, hellhound, bloodhound, or watchdog subroutine}||A0B1G0T0:Put1PlusOne

property.name: Rules
property.value: [0]: Break ice subroutine.[1]: +1 strength.Using Dropp [TM] ends your run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [1]: Break code gate subroutine.[2]: +1 strength.Put a +1 strength counter on Dupre' after each run during which it was used to break a subroutine. All strength counters on Dupre' are lost if you use Dupre' on a fort other than the one you last used it

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B1G0T0:SimplyAnnounce{break code gate subroutine}||A0B2G0T0:Put1PlusOne||A0B0G0T0:Put1Dupre Plus One Strength

property.name: Rules
property.value: [T]: Prevent yourself from being flatlined, though you still lose all cards in your hand. Remove all brain damage. For the remainder of the game, you have only three actions per turn, instead of four, your hand size is reduced by 1, and all meat damage is automatically prevented.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [3]: Break sentry subroutine.[1]: +1 strength.Prevents up to 2 Net and/or brain damage total each turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: After you access cards from HQ, look at all cards stored in HQ.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you make a successful run on a subsidiary data fort, put a Fait counter in that fort. Every two Fait counters in a fort give +1 difficulty to all agendas installed inside that fort.The Corp may remove all Virus counters by forgoing its next three actions.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [2]: The Corp must rez as much ice as possible on a fort, beginning with the outermost ice and working in. Use this ability only after a successful run on that fort.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevents up to 2 Net and/or brain damage total each turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, give the Corp a Gremlin counter. Every two Gremlin counters decrease the Corp's hand size by 1.The Corp may remove all Virus counters by forgoing its next three actions.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [1]: Break wall subroutine.[2]: +1 strength for the remainder of this run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [1]: Break wall subroutine.[1]: +1 strength.Whenever you break a wall subroutine with Hammer, lose a total of [2] from stealth cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [T]: Put a Spy counter in a data fort. A Spy counter exposes all cards installed inside or on a fort containing it. The Corp may remove a Spy counter by taking an action to pay [4]. Use this ability only immediately after a successful run on that fort.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Imp can have up to 2 MU of programs installed in it. All icebreakers installed in this way have their strength reduced by 1. If Imp leaves play, trash all programs installed in it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you make a successful run, give the Corp an Incubate counter. Each Incubate counter necessitates a die roll at the start of each of your turns on each 6, choose a Virus counter and exchange that counter for two counters of the same type.The Corp may remove all Virus counters by forgoing its next three actions.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put [1] from the bank on Invisibility when it is installed. Use this bit only to pay for using icebreakers during runs, but not for using noisy icebreakers. If you use the bit, replace it at the start of your next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [0]: Break wall subroutine.[1]: +1 strength.Whenever you break a wall subroutine with Jackhammer, lose [1], if you can, from a stealth card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [0]: Break wall subroutine.[X]: +X strength, and forgo your next X actions.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [T]: Prevent one or more of your other installed programs from being trashed.[1]: Prevent one or more of your other installed programs from being trashed, and bring Joan of Arc into your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you are about to access cards from R&D, you may first choose to cut any number of cards from the top of R&D to the bottom of R&D.

property.name: Rules
property.value: A: Expose a card installed inside a data fort.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [0]: Show the top five cards of your stack to the Corp. If any of those cards are programs, trash Mystery Box and then install one of those programs, at no cost. Shuffle your stack afterwards. Use this ability only during a run and only once each run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reverse a fort's ice cards so that the outermost piece of ice becomes the innermost piece of ice, and so forth. Use this ability only immediately after a successful run on that data fort.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you make a successful run, put a Pattel counter on a piece of ice that had all its subroutines broken during that run. Each Pattel counter on a piece of ice reduces its strength by 1.The Corp may remove all Virus counters by forgoing its next three actions.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [3]: Break up to four wall subroutines on a single piece of ice.[1]: +1 strength.Whenever you use Pile Driver's break-walls subroutine, lose a total of [3] from stealth cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put [2] on Poltergeist when it is installed. Use these bits only to pay for trashing nodes. If you use any of these bits, replace them at the start of your next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you make a successful run, put a Pox counter in the fort that was run. Every two Pox counters in a fort require the Corp to pay [1], in addition to any other costs, to install a card inside or on that fort. The Corp may remove all Virus counters by forgoing its next three actions.

property.name: Rules
property.value: A: Make a run on R&D, but instead of accessing cards, look at the top five cards of R&D.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ice that attempts to trace you has its trace limit reduced by 1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [2]: Break wall subroutine.[1]: +1 strength.Whenever you break a wall subroutine with Ramming Piston, lose a total of [2] from stealth cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [0]: Break stun, hellbolt, or knockout subroutine.

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B0G0T0:SimplyAnnounce{break stun, hellbolt, or knockout subroutine}

property.name: Rules
property.value: [0]: Break ice subroutine that traces.[1]: +1 strength.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put [2] from the bank on Scatter Shot when it is installed. Use these bits only to pay for trashing upgrades. If you use any of these bits, replace them at the start of your next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [T]: Search your stack for a program and install that program, if you can. Shuffle your stack afterwards. Use this ability only during a run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevents up to 2 Net damage each turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: A: Make a run on the Archives. If run is successful, do not access cards from the Archives instead, treat run as a successful run on HQ.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [1]: +2 link. Use this ability only once during each trace attempt, and only after you and the Corp have revealed how much each of you spent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, give the Corp a Skivviss counter. Each Skivviss counter requires the Corp to draw one extra card at the start of each of its turns.The Corp may remove all Virus counters by forgoing its next three actions.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Once during each run, you may expose a piece of unrezzed ice as you approach it. You may then jack out before the Corp decides whether to rez the ice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Snowball has +1 strength for each subroutine it has broken during a run, until the end of that run.[1]: Break sentry subroutine.[1]: +1 strength

property.name: Rules
property.value: [0]: Jack out before an upgrade or node takes effect. Use this ability only immediately after the Corp has rezzed that upgrade or node.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [T]: Pay the rez cost of a piece of ice to trash that piece of ice. Use this ability only if you have just broken all the subroutines of that piece of ice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Succubus can have up to 3 MU of programs installed in it. If Succubus leaves play, trash all programs installed in it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put [2] from the bank on Vewy Vewy Quiet when it is installed. Use these bits only to pay for using icebreakers during runs, but not for using noisy icebreakers. If you use any of these bits, replace them at the start of your next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put [2] on Software Installer when it is installed. Use these bits only to pay for installing programs. You may use these bits to install a program overwriting Software Installer itself. If you use any of these bits, replace them at the start of your next

property.name: Rules
property.value: Make a run whether or not that run is successful, you may then make another run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Derez a piece of black ice of your choice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Do not play Arasaka Owns You as a normal action; instead, play it when you would suffer enough damage to flatline you. Prevent all of that damage, trash Arasaka Owns You, remove any brain damage you have suffered, and then refresh your hand to its maximum size. Gain [10] and remove all tags, at no cost. You forgo your next four actions, and you forfeit the next 3 agenda points you score.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if you made a successful run on HQ this turn. Pay the rez cost of a piece of rezzed ice to trash it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Make a run on R&D. If run is successful, access two additional cards from R&D.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if you liberated any Research agendas this turn. Put a Militech counter on each of your icebreakers. A Militech counter gives the icebreaker it is on +1 strength.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if you liberated any Gray Ops agendas this turn. Score 1 agenda point.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Make a run on HQ. If run is successful, and the Corp has any bits when you would access HQ, do not access cards from HQ instead, the Corp loses [1] and gives you a tag, and you gain [10].

property.name: Rules
property.value: Make a run on HQ. If run is successful, access two additional cards from HQ.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a piece of ice. The Corp either rezzes that piece of ice or trashes it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your trash for a program and bring it into your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if you made a successful run this turn. Rearrange the ice installed on the last fort on which you made a successful run. This does not expose any concealed ice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your trash for a card and bring it into your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Score 1 agenda point if you liberated any Black Ops agendas this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Expose up to three installed cards.

card.name: Ice and Data's Guide to the Net

property.name: Rules
property.value: Expose the outermost ice of each data fort.

card.name: If You Want It Done Right...

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look through the top five cards of your stack. Bring one of those cards into your hand, and arrange the rest in any order you choose.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Make a run. You automatically pass the first piece of ice you encounter during that run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Make a run on R&D you may trash, at no cost, any cards you access that were stored in R&D, even if the cards cannot normally be trashed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Make a run, and gain [9], which you may use only during that run. After that run is completed, suffer 1 brain damage this damage cannot be prevented. Then, return to the bank any of the [9] not spent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your stack for a card, and bring it into your hand. Reshuffle your stack afterwards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trash any number of your installed cards. Gain [3] for each card trashed in this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shuffle your hand, trash, and stack together, and then draw five cards. When you play MIT West Tier, remove it from the game instead of trashing it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Remove a tag, at no cost. You may pay [1] when you play Open-Ended(R) Mileage Program to take it back into your hand instead of trashing it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trash up to five cards from your hand. Gain [2] for each card trashed in this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Roll a die. On a 1, 2, or 3, gain that many bits, set aside that many dice to roll again, or choose some combination thereof. Repeat until you have rolled all the dice you set aside.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Make a run on HQ. If run is successful, do not access cards from HQ instead, pay any number of bits to force the Corp to lose that many bits.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Make a run on HQ. If run is successful, do not access cards from HQ instead, treat run as a successful run on R&D.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Make a run on HQ you may trash, at no cost, any cards you access that were stored in HQ, even if the cards cannot normally be trashed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if you made a successful run on HQ this turn. Trash a piece of unrezzed ice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a program from your trash or search your stack for a program. Install that program, at no cost. Shuffle your stack afterwards. At the end of the turn, take the program into your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hide at least 2 from your pool in your hand the Corp then guesses how many bits you hid. If the Corp guesses correctly, lose that many bits. Otherwise, choose a data fort and a piece of ice on that fort. Then make a run on that fort, during which you automatically pass that piece of ice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Make a run. You have +9 link for every trace attempt made during that run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if you made a successful run on HQ this turn. The Corp discards all cards. The Corp can retain cards by paying [2] for each card not discarded.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your stack for a program. Show that program to the Corp, and then bring it into your hand. Reshuffle your stack afterwards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if the Corp scored any Black Ops agendas during its last turn. The Corp discards five cards at random.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Remove all tags, at no cost, and automatically avoid receiving your next tag.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain up to five consecutive actions, which you may use only to install programs, and gain [1]. If you do not spend the bit during these actions, return it to the bank afterwards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Make a run on HQ. If run is successful, do not access cards from HQ instead, the Corp loses [4].

property.name: Rules
property.value: [1]: Base link 9. Use only one base link card for each trace attempt made against you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [2]: Base link 4. [2]: +1 link. Use only one base link card for each trace attempt made against you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [1]: Base link 1. [1]: +1 link. Use only one base link card for each trace attempt made against you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Provides +3 MU. Installing Arasaka Portable Prototype costs 1 agenda point, in addition to the normal cost. Put [3] from the bank on Arasaka Portable Prototype when it is installed. Use these bits only to pay for using icebreakers during runs. If you use any of these bits replace them at the start of your next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put [2] from the bank on Armored Road Home when it is installed. Use these bits only to pay for removing tags. If you use any of these bits, replace them at the start of your next turn. [T]: Prevent up to 3 meat damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put seven Ablative counters on Armored Fridge when it is installed. When the last Ablative counter has been removed, trash Armored Fridge. Ablative counter: Prevent 1 meat damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Provides +2 MU. Put [2] from the bank on Artemis 2020 when it is installed. Use these bits only to pay for using icebreakers during runs. If you use any of these bits, replace them at the start of your next turn. Only one deck can be in play at a time. Trash any older decks.

property.name: Rules
property.value: A: Look at the top five cards of your stack. You may bring any program cards among them into your hand. Pay [1] for each card taken in this way, and show those cards to the Corp. Shuffle your stack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [0]: Base link 2. [3]: +1 link. Use only one base link card for each trace attempt made against you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [1]: Base link 2. [2]: +1 link. Use only one base link card for each trace attempt made against you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Provides +1 MU. Once per turn, right after making a successful run, you can choose to make another run without taking an action to do so. Only one deck can be in play at a time. Trash any older decks.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each of your turns, you may take only one action to use Broker. A: Put [3] from the bank on Broker. A: Take all the bits from Broker.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if you made a successful run on HQ this turn. If the Corp forgoes actions to lose Virus counters, two counters of your choice are not removed. The Corp may trash Viral Cache by taking an action to pay [5]. This trashing cannot be prevented.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put [1] from the bank on Corolla Speed Chip when it is installed. Use this bit only to pay for using killers during runs. If you use the bit, replace it at the start of your next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Installing Corporate Ally costs 1 agenda point, in addition to the normal cost. The difficulty of all agendas is +1. Only one unique card of a particular name can be in play at a time. If for some reason more than one is in play, trash all but one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you draw one or more cards from your stack, draw an extra card then choose one of the cards drawn and either trash it or return it to the top of your stack. Only one unique card of a particular name can be in play at a time. If for some reason more than one is in play, trash all but one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: A, [T]: Remove up to three tags, at no cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevents all meat damage. The Corp may pay 1 agenda point to cancel this effect until end of turn. Only one unique card of a particular name can be in play at a time. If for some reason more than one is in play, trash all but one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put [2] from the bank on Mobile Environment when it is installed. Use these bits only to pay for removing tags. If you use any of these bits, replace them at the start of your next turn.

card.name: Field Reporter for Ice and Data

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the end of each of your turns, gain [1] for each piece of ice the Corp rezzed during that turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain [1] at the start of each of your turns.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevents all meat damage. For each [1] the Corp pays when meat damage is done, 1 point of meat damage is not prevented by this card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put [1] from the bank on Hell's Run when it is installed. Use this bit only to pay for increasing your link. If you use the bit, replace it at the start of your next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you access cards from HQ, access an additional card from HQ.

property.name: Rules
property.value: A, [1]: Bring the top card from your trash into your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain [1] each time you make a successful run. Only one unique card of a particular name can be in play at a time. If for some reason more than one is in play, trash all but one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [1]: Prevent 1 meat damage. [T]: Avoid receiving a tag.

property.name: Rules
property.value: A: Draw two cards. Use this ability only if you were damaged during any of your last three actions. [T]: Prevent 1 brain damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain [12] when Loan from Chiba is installed. At the start of each of your turns, lose [1]. If Loan from Chiba leaves play, pay [10] or lose the game. You may trash Loan from Chiba at the end of any of your turns.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one or more installed programs are being sent to the trash at the same time, you may instead choose to put any or all of the programs on top of Microtech Backup Drive in any order you choose. If Backup Drive is removed from play, trash any cards on it. A: Bring the Top card on Backup Drive into your Hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay [1], in addition to the normal cost, to break each ice subroutine. Ignore all AP subroutines except those that trace, or that do Net damage. Prevents all but 1 Net damage from each AP subroutine you do not break.

property.name: Rules
property.value: A: Look at the top four cards of your stack. You may bring any prep or resource cards among them into your hand. Pay [1] for each card taken in this way, and show those cards to the Corp. Shuffle the rest back into your stack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: A, [1]: Remove a tag, at no cost. [T]: Avoid receiving a tag.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Provides +2 MU. Put [3] from the bank on Pandora's Deck when it is installed. Use these bits only to pay for increasing your link. If you use any of these bits, replace them at the start of your next turn. Only one deck can be in play at a time. Trash any older decks.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Provides +1 MU. Put [1] from the bank on Parraline 5750 when it is installed. Use this bit only to pay for using icebreakers during runs. If you use the bit, replace it at the start of your next turn. Only one deck can be in play at a time. Trash any older decks.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Provides +1 MU. Put [3] from the bank on PK-6089a when it is installed. Use these bits only to pay for increasing your link. If you use any of these bits, replace them at the start of your next turn. Only one deck can be in play at a time. Trash any older decks.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each of your turns, you may choose to gain an action. If you do, suffer 1 brain damage at the end of the turn. This damage cannot be prevented.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the start of each of your turns, roll a die. On a 6, trash Quest for Cattekin, and you gain an action on each of your turns for the remainder of the game. On a 1, suffer 1 brain damage. On a 2, suffer 1 Net damage. Damage from Quest for Cattekin cannot be prevented.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you access cards from R&D, access an additional card from R&D.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Provides +1 MU. Prevents 1 Net damage each turn. Put [1] from the bank on Microcyb Eagle when it is installed. Use this bit only to pay for using icebreakers during runs. If you use the bit, replace it at the start of your next turn. Only one deck can be in play at a time. Trash any older decks.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Provides +1 MU. Put [3] from the bank on Microcyb Owl when it is installed. Use these bits only to pay for using icebreakers during runs, but not for using noisy icebreakers. If you use any of these bits, replace them at the start of your next turn. Only one deck can be in play at a time. Trash any older decks.

property.name: Rules
property.value: A: Make a run on the Archives. If run is successful, do not access cards from the Archives instead, shuffle the face-up pile of the Archives and then put the top two cards from that pile on R&D.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a data fort when Restrictive Net Zoning is installed. The Corp must pay [2], in addition to the normal cost, to install ice on that fort.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put [12] from the bank on Rigged Investments when it is installed. At the start of each of your turns, take [1] from Investments. When all the bits have been removed, trash Investments.

property.name: Rules
property.value: A: Look at the top five cards of your stack. You may bring any hardware cards among them into your hand. Pay [1] for each card taken in this way, and show those cards to the Corp. Shuffle the rest back into your stack. A, [2]: Expose any card.

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A1B0G0T0:SimplyAnnounce{look for Hardware in their stack}||A1B2G0T0:ExposeTarget-Targeted

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put [12] from the bank on Short-Term Contract when it is installed. When all the bits have been removed, trash Short-Term Contract. A: Take [2] from Short-Term Contract.

property.name: Rules
property.value: A: Gain [1] and draw one card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the start of each of your turns, you may trash one of your other installed cards to gain [2]. Only one unique card of a particular name can be in play at a time. If for some reason more than one is in play, trash all but one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [0]: Base link 4. [1]: +1 link. You may use Submarine Uplink only during a run. Using Submarine Uplink forces you to jack out after the current encounter ends. Use only one base link card for each trace attempt made against you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: A: Look at the top card of R&D.

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A1B0G0T0:SimplyAnnounce{look at the top card of R&D}

property.name: Rules
property.value: Provides +1 MU. Prevents 1 meat damage each turn. Put [5] on Techtronica [TM] Utility Suit when it is installed. Use these bits only to pay for increasing your link. If you use any of these bits, replace them at the start of your next turn. Only one deck can be in play at a time. Trash any older decks.

property.name: Rules
property.value: A: Choose a program or hardware card from your hand. Set that card aside, and put a number of Shell counters on it equal to its installation cost. When the last Shell counter on that card has been removed, install that card, at no cost. Remove one Shell counter from one card at the start of each of your turns.

property.name: Rules
property.value: A, [1]: Search your stack for a program. Show that program to the Corp, and then bring it into your hand. Reshuffle your stack afterwards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [1]: +1 link. Use this ability only once during each trace attempt, and only after you and the Corp have revealed how much each of you spent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain [2] at the start of each of your turns. Trash Top Runners' Conference when you make a run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put two Trauma counters on Trauma Team [TM] when it is installed. Trauma counter: Prevent 1 meat damage. A: Put one Trauma counter on Trauma Team [TM].

property.name: Rules
property.value: [T]: Prevent an installed program or hardware card from being trashed.

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B0G0T1:SimplyAnnounce{prevent an installed program or hardware card from being trashed}

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each of your turns, you may choose to gain an action, which you may use only to make a run. You cannot spend more than [3] during that run to pay for using icebreakers or increasing your link. Use this ability only once per turn and only during your turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put [2] from the bank on ZZ22 Speed Chip when it is installed. Use these bits only to pay for using killers during runs. If you use any of these bits, replace them at the start of your next turn.
